title: Evidence-Based Practice (EBP) Learning Process Development in Social Welfare Organizations: Applying Workplace Reflective Practice

context.prior_knowledge: Practical experience in social welfare and understanding of basic research methodologies
context.additional_context: Mobile device-centric access required in PC-unavailable environments

learning_goals: Learners can analyze practical problems and derive improvement plans using EBP tools (e.g., questioning frameworks, evidence evaluation checklists) in social welfare settings.
Learners can reassess existing work practices through reflective practice discussions with peers/supervisors and present at least two double-loop learning (DLL) cases.
Learners can perform team-based EBP projects using smartphone-based collaboration platforms (e.g., Google Classroom, KakaoTalk channels) and submit a final report (approximately 5 pages).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
